title: Sphere - 1985 - On Tour (Live) (1996) FLAC
description:
Sphere - 1985 - On Tour (Live) (1996)

Sphere was one of the great repertory groups to emerge in the '80s. Longtime Thelonious Monk associate saxophonist Charlie Rouse teamed with bassist Buster Williams and drummer Ben Riley to perform Monk's material, with pianist Kenny Barron capably handling the keyboard duties. The group cut this album live in the mid-'80s and were recorded by the Red label. It was the only time this fine quartet was caught in a live setting during their tenure. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Dual Force
02 - Beautiful Friendship
03 - Scratch
04 - Tayamisha
05 - Spiral
06 - Well, You Needn't

Personnel:
BEN RILEY, Drums
KENNY BARRON, Piano
BUSTER WILLIAMS, Bass
CHARLIE ROUSE, Tenor Saxophone.

Enjoy and share!
